title: Ala Kahakai National Historic Trail: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved       Looking to get involved at the Ala Kahakai NHT?   NPS Centennial  The National Park Service turns 100 on August 25, 2016. As we lead up to the centennial, we invite you to participate in Find Your Park Experiences to learn, discover, be inspired, or simply have fun in national parks.   Partners The Ala Kahakai Trail Association (ATA) was established to ensure that the Ala Kahakai NHT is well connected to the community, that Hawaiian values and principles are in place and practiced, to foster partnerships and collaboration, and to provide help and guidance for the work of managing and sustaining the trail in perpetuity.  Planning The Final Comprehensive Management Plan (CMP) for the Ala Kahakai National Historic Trail is now available.
